title: M2: TM vs MT
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: elementary. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 1 minute. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: Students sometimes confuse Translation Memory (TM) and Machine Translation (MT). The basic distinction between the two technologies is that TM allows you to reuse existing (human) translations, whereas MT automatically creates new translations (albeit usually using models learned from existing translations).
